title: NFL Schedule Release Tonight
description:
With the NFL 2022 season schedule being released tonight, we are looking forward to a bunch of matchups. Damien Woody and Robert Griffin III join Laura, along with Adam Schefter to give you the latest updates.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
